oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Magdalene Garst Sherfy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of elderly Magdalene Garst Sherfy, herbalist and midwife. During the Civil War, Sherfy's home was used as a hospital (both Union and Confederate). Sherfy and her two daughters were nurses at the hospital during the war. Abraham Sherfy, her husband, was the half-brother of David Preston Sherfy.
